title: Angelina Jolie's Son Maddox Spoke Out About Brad Pitt and Their Strained Relationship
text:
From ELLE

It's been less than a month since Angelina Jolie's oldest son Maddox Jolie-Pitt was dropped off at Yonsei University in Seoul, South Korea, and he's already done a street interview about his alleged strained relationship with his dad (and Jolie's ex-husband) Brad Pitt. InTouch obtained the video of Maddox tactfully answering two questions posed by a paparazzo.

Maddox was asked whether Pitt would be visiting him at college. “I don’t know about that, what’s happening,” he replied. The reporter then asked if his relationship with Pitt was over for good. “Whatever happens, happens," Maddox replied. The focus of the questions shifted to Maddox's new life in South Korea. Maddox said he was living in dorms and made it pretty clear he's academically-focused right now.

Photo credit: Gisela Schober - Getty Images More

Us Weekly reported at the end of August that Maddox doesn't want to be close to Pitt. (Pitt reportedly got into an altercation with Maddox on a private plane in 2016; it was that incident that led Jolie to file for divorce.)

Us was told by a source that “Maddox doesn’t really see himself as Brad’s son.” A separate source described Maddox as having "some simmering resentment" toward Pitt, though attributed it partly to Maddox just being a teenager seeking independence. Maddox is said to be very close to his mother.

Pitt, Us was told by a source, hadn't lost hope on Maddox. "Brad’s hopeful that as his son gets older, they’ll become close again," the source said.

description: He was asked whether his and Brad Pitt's relationship was over for good, and he answered honestly.
